primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God intervenes in a state of total human death and spiritual dryness to reconstitute and reanimate His people, not based on their merit but for the sake of His own holy name.

tekstueel_bewijs: It is not for your sake... that I am about to act
I will put my Spirit within you
The light seemed to be coming from him
snatches us from the very jaws of death
for the sake of my holy name
because of God’s essential nature going out toward us
the scoffings of the cultural elite
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: Death is presented as an absolute barrier ('clean cut off') that no human effort can bridge.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The human response of faith and submission to the divine act.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer/Prophet
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The human 'doing' (submitting) is a response to the divine 'doing' (raising the dead).

voorbeelden_god_subject: God is greater than our doubts
I will put my Spirit within you
His righteousness reaches out and snatches us
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We are preparing to enter Holy Week

voorbeelden: we need to try to be like the black slaves
you can soak up the rituals... without actually believing
you know what that means, don’t you?
there was no breath in them
no deliverance except by a miracle of God’s in-breaking power

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on human 'non-pouvoir' (inability) met by God's 'pouvoir' (sovereign power).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from S2 (Death/Judgment) through ~S1 (failed self-righteousness) to S1 (Grace).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in the 'Holy Name' of God which acts when human righteousness fails.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; death is literal and spiritual.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon explicitly rejects human agency as the cause of salvation, placing the 'engine' of the story entirely in God's character.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Submit to him this day, with joy

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as sole active Subject of salvation
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: It is not for your sake... that I am about to act

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Ezekiel and Lazarus are not models to imitate, but witnesses to God's power.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: God is the one who speaks to the bones.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and awe; removal of the burden of self-salvation.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: his righteousness reaches out and snatches us

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit provides the 'Pouvoir' (life) that the bones lack.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a masterclass in theocentric narrative structure.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: The emphasis on 'Pouvoir' is appropriate for a Lenten sermon on resurrection.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon perfectly aligns the grammatical subject with the theological Subject.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While rhetoric might focus on the 'highbrow' vs 'lowbrow' imagery, semiotics reveals that the underlying 'engine' is God's 'holy name' acting on passive objects.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the valley; semiotics explains why the valley requires a Subject-switch from Ezekiel to God.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas's model exposes that the 'good news' is specifically a shift in the Sender-Receiver axis where the mandate (Devoir) is replaced by Gift (Pouvoir).

appendices.notities: Analysis confirms Fleming Rutledge's own homiletical theory in practice.
